title: Implement automated deployment pipeline
description: Build continuous deployment pipeline that automatically tests, builds, and deploys code changes to production with rollback capabilities and health monitoring
iWant: fully automated deployment pipeline with zero-downtime releases
soThat: I can deploy code changes within 10 minutes while maintaining 99.9% uptime
acceptanceCriteria: Pipeline automatically triggers on code merge to main branch
Deployment completes within 10 minutes including health checks
Automatic rollback occurs if health checks fail within 5 minutes
Zero-downtime deployment maintains service availability throughout process
